question: Which of the following is the easiest way of finding out the nutritional status for large number of children in a short time?
option2: Studying their hair, face and eyes
explanation: The nutritional status of a large number of children can be calculated by knowing their body mass index .It is a physical measurement used to assess total amount of body fat. It is calculated by dividing your weight in kilograms (kg) by the square of your height in metres (m<sup>2</sup>). Depending on the BMI value calculated, one may be underweight, normal weight, overweight or obese.
